metadata.description: Professional Claude Code plugins for AI engineering excellence

plugins.name: copywriter
plugins.description: Expert copywriting for UX, marketing, and product with Chain-of-Density summarization. Write compelling copy and iteratively compress verbose content.

plugins.name: build-agent-skills
plugins.description: Build skills with the Agent Skills open standard - create, validate, and publish portable skills for AI agents

plugins.name: aws-agentcore-langgraph
plugins.description: Deploy LangGraph 1.0 agents on AWS Bedrock AgentCore with memory, gateway, and runtime integration

plugins.name: baml
plugins.description: BAML plugin for type-safe LLM extraction - generates BAML code from requirements, designs schemas, runs tests, debugs issues. Includes LangGraph integration patterns, MCP-powered code generation, 3 skills, 3 agents, 4 commands.

plugins.name: para-pkm
plugins.description: Manage PARA-based personal knowledge management (PKM) systems using Projects, Areas, Resources, and Archives organization method

plugins.name: vhs-recorder
plugins.description: Professional terminal recording with Charm's VHS - comprehensive guidance for creating polished CLI demonstrations, tutorials, and documentation videos

plugins.name: adversarial-coach
plugins.description: Adversarial code review based on Block's g3 dialectical autocoding research - validates implementations against requirements with fresh context objectivity

plugins.name: mem8
plugins.description: Memory-augmented development workflows - 8 commands for planning, implementation, debugging, and research with persistent memory across sessions
